column1: * Isildur plants a seedling of the White Tree of Gondor in Minas Anor. He delivers the South-kingdom to Meneldil.

column2: note 9 says Isildur left on Yavannië 5 which corresponds with our 27 August depending on how you calculate

column1: * 25 Disaster of the Gladden Fields; deaths of Isildur
column3: Aratan and Ciryon. states the event happened on the "thirtieth day"
column4: so 29 days later being 25 September or Narquelië 4
